snippet: City officials said that the building, John F. Kennedy High, is structurally sound, and that the areas affected by the blast last month have been sealed off.
abstract: John F Kennedy High School, building that houses seven different schools and was damaged in explosion during summer construction, is deemed safe and will open for first day of school year.
lead_paragraph: City officials said that the building, John F. Kennedy High, is structurally sound, and that the areas affected by the blast last month have been sealed off.

headline.main: Manhattan School Damaged in Explosion Will Open Next Week
headline.print_headline: School Damaged in Blast Is Reopening

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Kennedy, John F, High School (Manhattan, NY)
